Token.Abstract: The PPHPaymentProcessor is your one stop shop for turning various events into real money movement for your merchants. It supports card swipes, manually entered card data, chip and pin, and checkin/tab based transactions.
Capture funds against an open tab from PPHLocalManager and PPHLocationWatcher

Parameter.Name: tab
Parameter.Abstract: information about the tab (only id is needed)

Parameter.Name: invoice
Parameter.Abstract: the invoice on which to collect funds (total, currency, invoiceId are the main elements). You must save this invoice before attempting to collect payment.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: called when the action has completed

Token.Abstract: Authorize a chip and pin card after pin has been validated

Parameter.Name: auth
Parameter.Abstract: from PPHCardReaderManager auth event.

Parameter.Name: invoice
Parameter.Abstract: the invoice on which to collect funds (total, currency, invoiceId are the main elements). You must save this invoice before attempting to collect payment.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: called when the action has completed

Token.Abstract: Collect funds against a card that has been passed through a reader and for which magstripe data is available.

Parameter.Name: card
Parameter.Abstract: from PPCardReaderManager swipe event

Parameter.Name: invoice
Parameter.Abstract: the invoice on which to collect funds (total, currency, invoiceId are the main elements). You must save this invoice before attempting to collect payment.

Parameter.Name: signature
Parameter.Abstract: Currently, the signature must be captured before the transaction attempt. We will be fixing this bug over the coming months.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: called when the action has completed

Token.Abstract: Collect funds against a card that has been manually entered.

Parameter.Name: card
Parameter.Abstract: Filled out manually or via a Card Scan

Parameter.Name: invoice
Parameter.Abstract: the invoice on which to collect funds (total, currency, invoiceId are the main elements). You must save this invoice before attempting to collect payment.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: called when the action has completed

Token.Abstract: Provide a signature record for a previously successful charge. TODO - currently we expect this to be gathered before the card present attempt, which is unpleasant.

Parameter.Name: signature
Parameter.Abstract: the buyer-generated signature

Parameter.Name: response
Parameter.Abstract: the result of beginCardPresentChargeAttempt

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: called when the action has completed

Token.Abstract: Capture funds against a chip&pin or chip card

Parameter.Name: approvalFromTerminalOrNil
Parameter.Abstract: for chip&pin card, this is passed to you by PPHCardReaderManager event

Parameter.Name: auth
Parameter.Abstract: for chip&pin card, this is passed to you by PPHCardReaderManager event

Parameter.Name: invoice
Parameter.Abstract: the invoice on which to collect funds (total, currency, invoiceId are the main elements). You must save this invoice before attempting to collect payment.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: called when the action has completed

Token.Abstract: Capture funds against a chip&pin&signature or chip&signature card

Parameter.Name: approvalFromTerminalOrNil
Parameter.Abstract: for chip&pin card, this is passed to you by PPHCardReaderManager event

Parameter.Name: signature
Parameter.Abstract: the buyer-generated signature

Parameter.Name: auth
Parameter.Abstract: for chip&pin card, this is passed to you by PPHCardReaderManager event

Parameter.Name: invoice
Parameter.Abstract: the invoice on which to collect funds (total, currency, invoiceId are the main elements). You must save this invoice before attempting to collect payment.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: called when the action has completed

Token.Abstract: Check if the given swipe data is for the same card that the invoice was paid with

Parameter.Name: card
Parameter.Abstract: the card data to be checked

Parameter.Name: invoice
Parameter.Abstract: the invoice against which to check the card

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: called when the action has completed

Token.Abstract: Check if the given chip+pin card data is for the same card that the invoice was paid with

Parameter.Name: auth
Parameter.Abstract: the chip+pin card data to be checked

Parameter.Name: invoice
Parameter.Abstract: the invoice against which to check the card

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: called when the action has completed
